briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Quetiapine Versus Quetiapine Plus Lithium in Bipolar Depression
officialTitle: A Randomised, Multi-Centre Study to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Extended Release Quetiapine Fumarate (Seroquel XR TM) Tablets as Mono-Therapy or in Combination With Lithium in the Treatment of Patients With Acute Bipolar Depression
summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy of quetiapine fumarate monotherapy with quetiapine fumarate in combination with lithium in the treatment of a major depressive episode in patients with bipolar disorder.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Montgomery-Asberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS) Total Score.
